USA: João da Gama arrives in Acapulco and claims to have explored North America as far as Juan Rodríguez Cabrillo and Francis Drake.
Taiwan: Chinese from Fujian start settling in southwestern Taiwan
Russia: Russo-Swedish War (1590–1595): The Treaty of Plussa expired. Muscovite troops laid siege to Narva.
Russo-Swedish War (1590–1595): A Swedish governor on the disputed territory surrendered to the Muscovites.
Philippine: Missionaries from the Society of Jesus established the Colegio de Manila in Intramuros.
Japan: Toyotomi Hideyoshi has prevailed over Late Hōjō clan in Siege of Odawara in Kantō region, completing the re-unification of Japan.
China: Wu Cheng'en wrote Journey to the West.
